explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a Deep Reinforcement Learning algorithm, which is a subset of machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions using Deep Reinforcement Learning for financial portfolio trading.
explanations.deep learning: The algorithm is based on Deep Q-learning, which is a deep learning technique.
explanations.neural network: Deep Q-learning typically involves neural networks as function approximators.
explanations.representation learning: Deep learning inherently involves learning representations from data, which is relevant here.
explanations.deep belief network: Deep Q-learning can be implemented using deep belief networks, though not explicitly mentioned.
explanations.DBM: Deep Boltzmann Machines (DBM) are related to deep belief networks and could be part of the underlying architecture.
